name: In re Nomination Petition of Stanley E. BRANCHE as Candidate for the Democratic Nomination for Representative in Congress From the First Congressional District. OBJECTION OF Thomas M. FOGLIETTA and Michael Foglietta
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Branche

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of Stanley E. BRANCHE as Candidate for the Democratic Nomination for Representative in Congress From the First Congressional District. OBJECTION OF Thomas M. FOGLIETTA and Michael Foglietta.
attorneys: Robert J. Dixon, Philadelphia, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
509 A.2d 867
In re Nomination Petition of Stanley E. BRANCHE as Candidate for the Democratic Nomination for Representative in Congress From the First Congressional District. OBJECTION OF Thomas M. FOGLIETTA and Michael Foglietta.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 13, 1986.
Decided May 16, 1986.
Robert J. Dixon, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gregory Harvey, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
